text: "Border Song" is a 1970 song by Elton John. It is from his second studio album Elton John. It went to number 29 in the Netherlands, number 34 in Canada and number 91 in the United States and did not chart in the United Kingdom. It has been covered by Aretha Franklin and Willie Nelson. ==Format and track list== *1970 US/Canadian 7" single # "Border Song" 3:22 # "Bad Side of the Moon" 3:15 ==References== Category:1970 songs Category:Elton John songs Category:Aretha Franklin songs Category:Willie Nelson songs
title: Border Song
